channel.title: Comments on: What is Bitcoin Mining?

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: I really like the fact that there are regulations to mining bitcoin. Thanks for this eye opener.
item.content:encoded: I really like the fact that there are regulations to mining bitcoin. Thanks for this eye opener.

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description: This is a big one. I must confess, I have zero knowledge of this. Thanks to Atomic Team for taking us through this.
item.content:encoded: This is a big one. I must confess, I have zero knowledge of this. Thanks to Atomic Team for taking us through this.

item.title: By: chirao farl
item.dc:creator: chirao farl
item.description: Bitcoin is Digital gold no doubt but mining isn't profitable right now! Still I belief if anybody want to start btc mining that will be good guide for him!
item.content:encoded: Bitcoin is Digital gold no doubt but mining isn’t profitable right now! Still I belief if anybody want to start btc mining that will be good guide for him!

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: Bitcoin mining is no longer as profitable as it used to be, but I am grateful that you have a great guide to show users as Bitcoin mining works.
item.content:encoded: Bitcoin mining is no longer as profitable as it used to be, but I am grateful that you have a great guide to show users as Bitcoin mining works.
